dcterms:description: The LIDC-IDRI dataset consists of 1018 thoracic CT scans with lesion segmentations from four experts. A pre-processed version of the dataset is used, consisting of 128 Ã— 128 patches containing lesions, totaling 15,096 patches, split into training, validation, and testing sets.
dcterms:title: LIDC-IDRI
